3 LccpSegmentationAlgorithm::LccpSegmentationAlgorithm(ros::NodeHandle* handle, std::string name):
4  nh_(*handle), service_name_(name){
5  ROS_INFO("Segmentation service started");
6  segmentation_server_ = nh_.advertiseService(service_name_, &LccpSegmentationAlgorithm::segmentationCallback,
7  this);
8 }
9 
10 bool LccpSegmentationAlgorithm::segmentationCallback(segmentation_lccp::segmentation::Request &req,
11  segmentation_lccp::segmentation::Response &res){
12  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGBA>::Ptr cloud(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGBA>);
13  pcl::fromROSMsg(req.input_cloud, *cloud);
14  std::unique_ptr<lccp_segmentation> seg(new lccp_segmentation);
15  seg->init(*cloud);
16  std::vector<Object> seg_objs;
17  seg->segment();
18  seg_objs = seg->get_segmented_objects();
19 
20  //Table cloud
21  CloudPtr table_cloud = seg->get_plane_cloud();
22  for(uint i = 0; i < table_cloud->points.size(); ++i){
23  table_cloud->at(i).r = 0;
24  table_cloud->at(i).g = 255;
25  table_cloud->at(i).b = 0;
26  table_cloud->at(i).a = 255;
27  }
28  pcl::toROSMsg(*table_cloud, res.plane_cloud);
29 
30  //Object clouds
31  for(uint i=0;i<seg_objs.size();++i){
32  sensor_msgs::PointCloud2 obj_msg;
33  pcl::toROSMsg(seg_objs[i].obj_cloud, obj_msg);
34  obj_msg.header.seq = i;
35  obj_msg.header.frame_id = req.input_cloud.header.frame_id;
36  obj_msg.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
37  res.object_cloud.push_back(obj_msg);
38  }
39  return true;
40 }

Definition: segmentation_lccp.h:26
lccp_segmentation
Class to detect table top objects in a cluttered scene segmenting the point cloud. Algorithm is based on http://docs.pointclouds.org/trunk/classpcl_1_1_l_c_c_p_segmentation.html.
